issue.title: [R] R Arrow Cookbook
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-13392](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-13392). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
This is an umbrella issue for known improvements to make to the R version of the Arrow cookbook

comments.body:
